casebody.data:
No. 154,

Mise.

McLaurin v. Murrah et al. Thurgood Marshall, Amos T. Hall, William R. Ming, Jr., James M. Nabrit, Marian Wynn Perry and Frank D. Reeves for petitioner.

Motion for leave to withdraw the petition for writ of mandamus granted and the clerk is authorized to return the record to the District Court.
